attributes.action: Ban the use of Export Payment Gaurantees for ALL Arms Contracts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Arms Companies currently receive subsidy from the tax payers conservativly estimated at £13500 per annum for every job in the industry. A major portion of this comes from Export Payment Gauranties where sales have been to Regiemes that show signs of financial irresponsibility and human rights abuse. Enlightened self interest demands that public money not be wasted on increasing the bank accounts of foreign dictators.
